やんばるエリア内での交通手段の満足度の理由: There was too much waiting time, so I wasn’t able to make good use of my time.
体験・サービス満足度の理由(やんばるエリア): The food in Japan is delicious, and Okinawa has beautiful nature. I had an amazing time there.
推奨項目(やんばるエリア): I’d recommend Yanbaru for its beautiful nature and relaxing atmosphere. It’s a great place to escape the city and enjoy a peaceful, authentic side of Okinawa.
改善点の内容(やんばるエリア): Public transportation was a bit limited, so it was sometimes difficult to get around without a car. It would be great if there were more bus services or clearer information for visitors.
